path: ./Audit_Reports_2024/Verichains_Lab/Verichains Public Audit Report - Ronin Bridge - v1.1.pdf

findings.title: Missing length check for _supports and _signatures arrays
findings.description: The condition _supports.length == _signatures.length && _signatures.length > 0 should be checked before processing.

findings.title: Waste of gas when trying to send native tokens two times
findings.description: In the handleAssetTransfer function, the contract tries to call _to.send(0) to check if the recipient can receive native tokens, which is a waste of gas.

findings.title: Inconsistent Thresholds in WithdrawalLimitation.sol
findings.description: fullSigThreshold and lockedThreshold are not consistent with the description
